name: Danger Dungeon (In The Box Game Studios)
name_original: Danger Dungeon (In The Box Game Studios)
description:
This is Danger Dungeon, a Javascript Rougelike, made using a custom in-house library we call RogueJS.

All art and code were made in under 24 hours.

The game has 4 different enemies; a slime, a skeleton, a zombie, and a "Destroyer".

The slime is a very basic enemy, it doesn't have anything special about it.

The skeleton can move twice in one turn.

The zombie has the most HP of the bunch at 3.

The Destroyers can destroy the walls around them to regain HP.
